item.description:
I'm going to schedule another movie meetup at West Boylston Cinema. Right now, they're showing some of the best films from the summer. It's a second run theater, so their movies are a few months old and they charge only $5 for an evening show.

The Hangover is about four guys who go to Las Vegas for a bachelor party. The next morning, the groom is missing and the other three can't remember what they did the night before. It's silly and raunchy and hilarious!

The movie starts at 7:15 PM on Thursday, November 5. Let's meet in the lobby at about 6:45.

Here the IMDB page on The Hangover: http://www.imdb.com/t...

And here's the web page for the West Boylston Cinema: http://www.westboylst...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my Superman cap.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Hangover
